name: Arc Style: Baseball!! SP
overview: A simple baseball game where you can hit, throw, and have fun. Let's enjoy creating special magic balls and players and teams! !! It is a baseball game where you can enjoy the basic charms of baseball, such as hitting and throwing. A surprising enemy team is waiting for you after the battle. Batting method! Aim for one shot, if you hit it, you can go to first base, you can hit anywhere, and so on. Magic ball! A magic ball that can be operated by tilting the Wii U GamePad. Please interweave with the classic changing ball and throw it over. Create an original team! You can create your own team by combining the body shapes and facial features of the players. Since some of the baseball rules are omitted, even beginners can easily play.
